example.eg: The teacher had to ask the disruptive student to leave the class, so that the other students could get some work done.
example.egtrans: 老师请那位引起混乱的学生离开教室，免得影响其他同学学习。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 引起混乱的, 造成破坏的, 扰乱性的

example.eg: The smartphone is one of the most disruptive technologies of the early 21st century.
example.egtrans: 智能手机是21世纪早期最具颠覆性的科技创新。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 颠覆性的, 开创性的
